3.19.19  10:03 pm   On the H3 podcast and this questions page, you talk about not remembering some details about working on some projects. In your long response to why "Might Quit" was late, you say that you had to refer to your "records" to remember what happened on certain days. Are you so involved in creating these projects that working is just a blur? Do you work so hard that your memory just blacks out? I hope you aren't too stressed/putting a ridiculously unhealthy amount of pressure on yourself.
